import React from 'react'; import { render } from 'react-dom'; import { Container, Row, Col, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from './Header'; import Slider from 'react-animated-slider'; import 'react-animated-slider/build/horizontal.css'; import { Styles } from "./common/styles/Combine"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Datas from '../data/hero/hero-slider.json'; const SliderDemo = () => (
{Datas.map((data, i) => (

{data.title}

{data.desc}

Research Citations Per Paper
QS World University Rankings | Asia | 2022
Apply Now Enquire
view our
story
))}
); export default SliderDemo;
